examples: He made the offer mighty appealing.

It was an appealing plan but quite impracticable.
A mother is appealing for the safe return of her baby son.
The back view of the hotel was even less appealing than the front.
Some indefinable quality makes that movie star very appealing.
He added an appealing and memorable figure to popular American mythology.
Appealing to the referee does not often result in a decision being changed.
The council must now decide whether to go to the expense of appealing through the courts.
I tried appealing to his better nature (=his feelings of kindness) but he wouldn't agree to help us.
The automaker is revamping a number of its cars in an effort to make them more appealing to younger consumers.
